user.title: Configure your bpost account
user.description: Fill in the email address used to configure your bpost app. The mobile app needs to be configured for My Mail and parcel tracking for this to work.

verify_code.title: Verification
verify_code.description: bpost has sent you an email with a verification code. Please fill in the code below.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authentication
reauth_confirm.description: Your authentication has expired. Continue to re-authenticate. You will receive a verification code through email.

error.cannot_connect: The connection to the bpost API failed. Please verify that Home Assistant is connected to the internet, check your logs and file an issue.
error.invalid_auth: The account doesn't exist or verification failed.
error.unknown: An unknown error occured. Please check your logs and file an issue.

abort.already_configured: This account has already been configured.
